title: Ticket #5003: Improve ClassAd functions for job argument/environment manipulation
description:
The ClassAd functions added in HTCondor 8.3.5 for manipulating the arguments and environment variables of job ads could use some improvements.

  • The envV1ToV2() function doesn't handle cross-platform submissions between unix and windows, because we use different delimiters. The job ad can have an attribute saying which delimiter is in use: EnvDelim. We could add an optional second argument to envV1ToV2() that specifies the delimiter. No argument or one that evaluates to Undefined would mean use the normal delimiter for the local platform.

  • The functions for converting command-line argument strings to/from ClassAd lists can't be used directly to modify the arguments of a job. This can be done in Python via the Python bindings.
